Class playn.core.gl.QuadShader

Added Methods
String baseVertexShader() Returns the vertex shader program with placeholders for a few key constants.
int extraVec4s() Returns how many vec4s this shader uses above and beyond those in the base implementation.
int vec4sPerQuad()  
 

Added Fields
String VERT_ATTRS Declares the attribute variables for our shader.
String VERT_EXTRACTDATA Extracts the values from our data buffer.
String VERT_SETCOLOR The shader code that computes {@code v_Color}.
String VERT_SETPOS The shader code that computes {@code gl_Position}.
String VERT_SETTEX The shader code that computes {@code v_TexCoord}.
String VERT_UNIFS Declares the uniform variables for our shader.
String VERT_VARS Declares the varying variables for our shader.
int maxQuads
